converted_data.job_description: Filiale de VINCI Energies, TCI+ est le leader en transition énergétique et en transformation numérique au Québec. Le poste implique la modernisation du Front-End, le développement de nouvelles fonctionnalités, et la collaboration avec l’équipe.
converted_data.requirements: Maîtrise d’Angular (v17+) et de TypeScript, expérience avec Material Design et RxJS, connaissance des API REST, optimisation des performances, tests unitaires et end-to-end, expérience avec Fabric.js et CI/CD avec Azure DevOps (un atout).

converted_data.job_description: Join our advanced technology team as a Software Developer, focusing on designing, developing, and optimizing platform and cloud-based solutions. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to drive innovations in back-end engineering.
converted_data.requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field, minimum 5 years of back-end software development experience, strong proficiency in Python and Azure, experience with CI/CD, Docker, and Kubernetes.

converted_data.job_description: The Front-End software developer is responsible for creating and implementing the visual and interactive elements of the Montrium Connect applications, including UI designs and layouts. They collaborate with designers and back-end developers to ensure functionality and aesthetics.
converted_data.requirements: University degree in software science or engineering with 5 years of front-end development experience. Strong programming skills, fluency in English and French, and experience with technologies like TypeScript, React, and GraphQL.

converted_data.job_description: Bounteous is a digital transformation consultancy that partners with brands to create digital solutions. They focus on strategy, analytics, digital engineering, and more.
converted_data.requirements: 6+ years of Python development experience, understanding of Python stacks and frameworks, familiarity with SQL and NoSQL, problem-solving skills, knowledge of Spark, Bigdata, Cloud, and Machine Learning technologies.

converted_data.job_title: Développeur frontend senior - Senior Frontend Developer
converted_data.job_description: OneSpan is looking for a Senior Frontend Developer to join our team in Montreal, Canada. We are building digital signature applications with cutting edge frontend technologies like react, ExpressJs and GraphQL. You will have a chance to contribute to a highly maintained, widely test covered software written with all the advance toolings and design patterns.
converted_data.requirements: Minimum 5 years of experience in design/development of web applications. Strong experience with end-to-end release and deployment of web applications. Deep knowledge in HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, React, js and NPM. Experience in using software best practices like test-driven development (TDD) and continuous integration.

converted_data.job_description: Bounteous is a digital transformation consultancy that partners with brands to create digital solutions. The role requires strong technical skills in Python and related technologies.
converted_data.requirements: 6+ years of experience in Python development, understanding of frameworks like Numpy and Pandas, familiarity with SQL and NoSQL, and good problem-solving skills.

converted_data.job_description: The role involves designing and developing iOS applications, contributing to Backend For Frontend (BFF) development, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and producing thorough technical documentation.
converted_data.requirements: Proficiency in Swift and Python, experience with iOS frameworks, understanding of RESTful APIs, familiarity with version control systems, and strong problem-solving and communication skills.

converted_data.job_description: Join a large IT team in Quebec, working on various projects and developing high-quality applications. Responsibilities include analyzing client needs, creating solutions, and participating in documentation and training.
converted_data.requirements: Experience as a Developer, knowledge of Java, Spring, Angular, TypeScript, and cloud platforms. French language proficiency is required.

converted_data.job_description: Le développeur Front-end aidera à construire les interfaces utilisateurs web et travaillera en collaboration avec une équipe d’experts pour développer des interfaces conviviales et performantes.
converted_data.requirements: BAC en informatique ou équivalent, 5 ans d'expérience avec Angular, jQuery, HTML, CSS et JavaScript, expérience en développement sur Azure ou AWS, et connaissance des processus CI/CD.

converted_data.job_description: Join our dynamic team for a thrilling internship experience! You will work on exciting projects, develop new skills, and network with industry leaders. The internship program runs full-time from May 26th 2025 - August 29th 2025.
converted_data.requirements: Currently pursuing a degree in Design or related field, proficiency in design tools like Figma, a portfolio showcasing design work, understanding of UX/UI principles, strong communication skills, and ability to collaborate in a team-oriented environment.

converted_data.job_description: Role involves developing and optimizing web platforms, designing, programming, and maintaining SaaS solutions, collaborating with product teams, and ensuring application performance and security.
converted_data.requirements: University degree in computer science or related field, 5 years of PHP development experience, proficiency in CodeIgniter and Laravel, strong understanding of MVC and service-oriented architectures, bilingual in French and English.

converted_data.job_description: Cerbexa provides consulting and integration services, focusing on tailored solutions for clients. The role involves developing React Native applications, ensuring performance and security, and collaborating in an Agile environment.
converted_data.requirements: 5+ years of development experience, including 2 years with React Native and TypeScript. Proficiency in TypeScript, React.js, Redux, and Agile methodologies. French language proficiency is mandatory.
